snippet: Vivian Vosburg is the stepmother of one of two girls charged this week with felony aggravated stalking of Rebecca Ann Sedwick, 12, before she committed suicide.
abstract: Polk County, Fla, deputies arrest Vivian Vosburg, stepmother of one of two girls accused of bullying Rebecca Ann Sedwick before her suicide; she is booked on two counts of child abuse with bodily harm and four counts of child neglect.
lead_paragraph: Vivian Vosburg is the stepmother of one of two girls charged this week with felony aggravated stalking of Rebecca Ann Sedwick, 12, before she committed suicide.

headline.main: Florida: Stepmother of Girl Accused of Bullying Faces Abuse Charge
headline.print_headline:
Florida: Stepmother of Girl Accused
Of Bullying Faces Abuse Charge
